title: pivot
desc: reshape a matrix or map by re-indexing like the pivot function in pandas

input.name: data
input.description: map key is column name, map value are column values.

params.name: columns
params.description: Name of columns which value to be used to make new frameâ€™s columns

params.name: aggregate
params.description: Map key is groupKey, map value is aggregate function. Currently support Sum, Count, Mean, Min, Max
